title: Here's what to expect from the updated D&D rulebooks coming next year
description: There'll be more capitalization, for one thing.

title: Our 11 favorite trailers from the 2023 Future Games Show Summer Showcase
description: Catch up with the neatest PC game trailers from this year's Future Games Show summer livestream.

title: I told you guys Lords of the Fallen looked cool
description: The rebooted action RPG got an extended gameplay trailer at the Future Games Show today.

title: I have no idea what to make of this 'motorvania' about a biker coyote on a quest for vengeance, but I think I like it
description: A demo for Laika: Aged Through Blood is coming to Steam next week.

title: Diablo 4 review
description: A live service action RPG that almost buries everything that makes it great.

title: I was not expecting how much I'd dig this surreal adventure game where I've somehow broken 'Writer's Law' and have to escape my punishment
description: The Bookwalker: Thief of Tales offers an interesting mix of adventure game and turn based combat.

title: Assassin's Creed Mirage will include a 'desaturated blue/gray' mode for people who are stuck in 2007
description: (But it won't run on Windows Vista.)

title: The world's angriest Metroidvania is out soon and would probably make the Doom Guy flinch
description: Cookie Cutter's heroine is on a bloody rampage to save her girlfriend.

title: The 8 best cozy games to wishlist from the Wholesome Games Showcase
description: The Wholesome Games showcase was stacked with pastel goodness this year so we narrowed things down.

title: Mineko’s Night Market is a cozy slice of life with a huge helping of cats and crafts
description: Crafting trinkets weirder than late night shopping network.

title: Punting dudes off ledges in the Steam demo for this comedy prop combat game is bringing me a lot of joy
description: En Garde is a swashbuckling sword fighting (and foot kicking) game releasing this summer.

title: Daedalic turns one of its classic point-and-click adventures into a life-and-death survival game, and it feels a little weird
description: Surviving Deponia is coming to Steam later this year. But why?

title: If you've ever wanted to play Euro Truck Simulator in deep space, this new sci-fi trucking simulator might be just the thing
description: Star Trucker promises a retro-futuristic Americana vibe amongst the stars.

title: Cozy sim Lakeburg Legacies shows the real perfect match is city building and dating sims
description: Become the cozy romantic dictator you truly are deep inside.

title: I've played cooking sims and puzzle platformers, but a cooking platformer? I'm listening
description: In Magical Delicacy you traverse a bustling cliffside town, learn recipes or invent your own, and deliver meals to customers.

title: Venba's gorgeous meals stir up the joy and challenge of recreating family recipes
description: This narrative food adventure has announced its July launch date.

title: In cozy cat cafe sim Pekoe the cats are the ones running the show
description: All the purrtinent details on this doily-core sim launching this month.

title: This co-op farming game is the most jam-packed cutesy life sim I've seen since Stardew Valley
description: Fae Farm has the usual spread of activities and then some, but it's the approach to co-op I'm most interested in.

title: Sam Lake answers the biggest Alan Wake 2 question: What happened to his layers?
description: Getting to the bottom of the fashion mystery at the heart of Alan Wake 2.

title: How to watch the Future Games Show Summer Showcase 2023
description: Join Laura Bailey and Yuri Lowenthal for ten world premieres on Saturday.

title: Today's Wordle hint and answer #721: Saturday, June 10
description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for Saturday's puzzle.

title: Our apologies to every other Diablo 4 class, but Sorcerers are the fan favorite
description: Everyone wants to be a dirty Sorcerer, apparently.
